meanings.definition: One of a trillion equal parts.
meanings.sent1: I only had a trillionth of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The scientist divided the substance into a trillionth for analysis.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant carried a trillionth of the leaf, thinking it was a huge burden.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, each drop of water seemed like a trillionth of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The student found the trillionth piece of the puzzle and completed the picture.
